Description:
311981958 - IN/MP/33/201021/1 - Served for failure to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the trapping point between the punch and the bed of the machine on the combination metalworking machine in the workshop.

311982522 - IN/MP/33/201021/4 - Served for failure to ensure that local exhaust ventilation plant, namely in the paint spraying area, provided to prevent or control exposure to substances which are hazardous to health, namely paint spray, has been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last 14 months.

311982536 - IN/MP/33/201021/2 - Served for failure to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume, which is a known carcinogen, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

311982549 - IN/MP/33/201021/3 - Served for failure to ensure that lifting accessories such as chains and slings, are thoroughly examined by a competent person at least once every 6 months.
